items.title: Glasgow residents fear ‘havoc’ ahead of potential Celtic title celebrations
items.description: Community Councillors said part of the city centre was turned into a "no-go area" with "widespread damage to public and private property and people left terrified" during title celebrations by Celtic fans in 2023 and 2024.
